desc.1: Japan DAO Association, JDA, is a Pear to Pear Job Matching Community.
desc.2: It's a stimulating place for people exploring new working styles, because DAOs will be more common as a new way of working and managing organizations and lots of DAOs are joining JDA. JDA provides opportunities to improve your skills and achievements with your friends aiming to make a living in the blockchain companies and DAOs.

1.title: Pear to Pear Job Matching Community
1.desc: Provides a place producing synergy via "jobs"

2.title: Blockchain Engineer Education Project
2.desc: Educate blockchain engineers who will be active in DAOs

3.title: Influencer Development Support
3.desc: Support the development of DAO-related influencers

desc.1: The purpose of this community is to "increase the number of individuals who can make a living from DAOs".
desc.2: Here, you can learn from like-minded people, build your track record, and achieve financial freedom.
desc.3: Investors, managers, and corporate recruiters can reduce hiring costs and mismatches by communicating with people who are actually looking for jobs here.

1.title: For Those Who Want To Work At DAOs

desc.1: The goal of this project is to "increase the number of indiduals who can make a living from DAOs".
desc.2: Let's jump in JDA and learn with friends, build track records, and get financial freedom.

2.title: For Recruiters In DAOs And Blockchain Companies
2.desc: DAOs, investors, managers, and corporate recruiters who are hiring can reduce hiring costs and mismatches by communicating with actual job seekers here.
